result.title: Socio-economic assessment, incl. LCC and CBA reports
result.description: The report includes: (i) cost and social indicators, (ii) description and analysis of scenarios for SMART-Plant cost analysis, (iii) methodology for the cost benefit analysis as basis for the LCC approach, (iv) methodology, quantification process and CBA model for the social impact assessment of the SMART-Plant outcomes, (v) results on the application of the socio-economic impact assessment (cost and social constrains and benefits), (vi) results on surveys for public acceptance and the assessment of the market initiatives for the recovered products giving feedback to the exploitation strategy. (vii) The report on LCC results for relevant scenarios of SMART adoption, which will show economic benefits and payback times from an operator’s perspective.
